posts.title: Guitar Ice Cube Mold
posts.content: These novelty guitar ice cube molds are a fun and unique way to keep your drinks cold. The guitar ice cube mold is made from food grade silicone, and looks like a real guitar when it’s finished freezing. The guitar ice cube mold makes a great gift housewarming gift too.

posts.title: Wizard Of Oz Red Slipper Socks
posts.content: Put on these Wizard of Oz red slipper socks after a hard day’s work and get carried away to your own secluded Oz. They’re beautifully crafted with silver and red metallic threads and feature a warm terry cloth weave for unsurpassed comfort.

posts.title: Tattooed Dishwashing Gloves
posts.content: Protect your hands and look tough as you beat down on grease build-up while wearing the tattooed dishwashing gloves. These pink latex beauties come adorned with classic “tough guy” tattoos emblazoned along the knuckles.

posts.title: Fizzics Draft Beer System
posts.content: Get that fresh draft beer taste from any store-bought brand by placing the can or bottle inside this Fizzics draft beer system. After placing the beer inside, simply pull the lever to pour out a frosty ale with a sensational body and flavor.

posts.title: Organic Wool Dryer Balls
posts.content: Now you can save both time and money when washing your dirty laundry by using these organic wool dryer balls. They help reduce drying time by 10-20 minutes, reduce static cling, and also extend the life of your clothes and dryer machine.

posts.title: Metallic Glitter Hair Chalk
posts.content: Experiment with wild looks on the weekend by using  this temporary metallic glitter hair chalk. It comes in a pen styled encasing that makes application easy and mess-free, and offers six vibrant colors that can be blended together to create crazy combinations.

posts.title: Sheep Push Pin Holder
posts.content: Add a dash of adorable to your boring workstation by storing your pins inside this cute little sheep push pin holder. This small little sheep comes with 75 white head push pins that will masquerade as the sheep’s wool when they’re not in use.

posts.title: Rotating Eyes Desktop Alarm Clock
posts.content: The rotating eyes of the desktop alarm clock are perfect for anyone who isn’t particular about knowing the exact time. Its clever design works with the left eye rotating to tell the hour while the right eye tells the minutes, more or less.

posts.title: LEGO R2-D2
posts.content: Construct your favorite droid from Star Wars in LEGO form with this 2000+ piece LEGO R2-D2 kit. Designed for more advanced LEGO builders, this over-sized LEGO R2-D2 stands a mighty foot tall when completed, and is an excellent gift idea for Star Wars and LEGO fans.

posts.title: LEGO Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles
posts.content: Recreate your favorite action-packed, pizza-filled adventures with the LEGO Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles. With an elaborate sewer compound, Foot soldier, and accessories that includes a skateboard for sewer surfing, the good times are just getting started.

posts.title: Coffee Infused Energy Bars
posts.content: Remain alert and nourished throughout the day by snacking on these coffee infused energy bars. They’re made from simple vegan-friendly ingredients, contain 1 cup’s worth of coffee per bar and come in flavors like coconut mocha, caramel macchiato, and mocha latte.

posts.title: The Gripper Jar Opener
posts.content: Easily pop open any jar in your fridge on your first try by using the gripper jar opener. This dishwasher-safe kitchen tool features a sturdy plastic construction and works on any smooth-sided and grooved cap or lid ranging from 1 to 3.5 inches in diameter.
